message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. I'm willing to start with a price of $12,000, which I believe is a fair and reasonable offer considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I believe this price still represents a good deal for you, considering the value the product will bring to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for this valuable item.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,500. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make a bit more than that. I'm thinking of $11,250. This price still represents a good deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it's worth the investment.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,750. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

I can see we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm thinking of $11,500. This is as low as I can go, and I'm confident you'll find it's a fair price for the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,900. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

I'm starting to feel like we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm thinking of $11,750. This is as low as I can go, and I'm starting to think it's time for you to make a serious offer. I'm not getting any younger, and I need to get this deal done.

I understand your concerns, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. I'll offer $11,000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
